name: Peanut Chocolate Clusters
author: S. Marie G.

ingredients.name: pkg. (6 oz.) semi sweet chocolate morsels

instructions: Combine peanut butter, butterscotch morsels and chocolate morsels in a heavy saucepan. Place over low heat and cook, stirring constantly, until melted. Stir in peanuts. Drop by rounded teaspoon onto waxed paper; chill until firm. Store in a covered container in refrigerator.
